parameters.Subject: Datafactory Error
parameters.ErrorMessage: SpDailyDataRefreshSalesData failed, log on to portal for more details

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select DISTINCT DbrNodeID,DbrNodeType,DbrCode,DbrName,BrnNodeID,BrnNOdeType,BranchCode,SubDNodeID,SubDNodeType,SubDCode
FROM vwSalesHierarchyUptoSUBD WHERE DbrName <> 'Unknown'
UNION
Select DISTINCT DbrNodeID,DbrNodeType,DbrCode,DbrName,BrnNodeID,BrnNOdeType,BranchCode,NULL,NULL,NULL
FROM vwSalesHierarchy WHERE DbrName <> 'Unknown'

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

activities.name: CopyAFile
activities.description: Copy a file from the source store to the destination store.

activities.name: DeleteAFile
activities.description: Delete a file from the source store

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT * FROM tblFactCoverage_PCode WHERE RptMonthYear Between 202108 and 202306
SELECT * FROM tblFactTargetData_PCode WHERE RptMonthYear Between 202108 and 202306
select * from tblActiveStorelist where BranchSubDNodeType=150 and rptmonthYear>=202109 AND rptmonthYear<=202306
SELECT * FROM tblFactSalesDetail_PCode WHERE RptMonthYear Between 202203 and 202204
SELECT * FROM tblFactSBDData_PCode WHERE RptMonthYear Between 202211 and 202302
